attributes.action: Hold a referendum on rejoining the EU
attributes.additional_details:
The EU are our allies. They share our values and beliefs. We need to show solidarity in the face of Russian aggression including nuclear threats. The promised Utopia of Brexit has clearly not materialised and many people including former leave voters have changed their minds.

This will also help with the queues at Dover, will help our farmers and fishermen, will protect our vital financial services and resolve the border issues in Ireland.

Give us a chance to save the UK.
attributes.background: In the face of Russian aggression and Putin's apparent aim to weaken Europe, hold a referendum on rejoining the EU to show we are united. It is in our short and long term interests.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Seek to rejoin the EU: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/600832

Hold a referendum on re-joining the EU on previous terms: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609420
